definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: He preset the video recorder at the desired time.
sentences.chinese: 他按要求的时间预先把录像机调好。

sentences.english: It has guidance for consumer to choose and purchase digital video recorder.
sentences.chinese: 对广大用户选型购买数字录像机有一定指导意义。

sentences.english: We are having problems with one of the videotape players we purchased from you.
sentences.chinese: 我们向贵公司买空买的录像机有一台有问题。

sentences.english: He then entered the growing home-video market.
sentences.chinese: 随后他进入了正在增长的家用录像机市场。

sentences.english: The output of audio-visual file in the VCR, DVD players and computers as evidence.
sentences.chinese: 录像机，DVD机及电脑中的证据音像文件输出。

sentences.english: Robbin asked his mother whether they could have a video.
sentences.chinese: 罗宾问妈妈他们是否能买一台录像机。

sentences.english: Have you fathomed out how to work the video yet?
sentences.chinese: 你弄清楚如何操作录像机了吗？

sentences.english: The recorder can be controlled through a touch-sensitive front panel or via a mouse, remote control, or keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 录像机可以通过触摸面板，鼠标，遥控器或键盘操控。

sentences.english: That was the case with VCRs, Video cassette Recorders .
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个关于录像机的案例。

sentences.english: A peculiarity of the design is able to control play of multi-route video recorders by multi-methods.
sentences.chinese: 能用多种方法控制多路录像机是设计的一大特点。

sentences.english: Multifunctional videorecorders have enjoyed brick sales.
sentences.chinese: 多功能录像机一直在市场走俏。

sentences.english: This is a double tuner, a digital video recorder and hard drive 160GB.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个双调谐器，数字录像机和160GB硬盘。

sentences.english: Thanks to VCRs, that's no longer a problem.
sentences.chinese: 由于有了录像机，这不再是个问题。

sentences.english: The VHS player brought movies to people who'd stopped going to movies.
sentences.chinese: 家庭录像机把电影带进家中，使人们不再去电影院。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes technical progression of household VTR and market status.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了家用录像机的技术进展及市场现状。

definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]
